org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper

Class Message<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.Message<T>

  • public abstract class Message<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Wrapper Message class containing the base functionality for all LND Messages.

    Contains methods for:

  • Convert to underlying API Object
  • Convert to and from Json
  • Validation

    • Created by Philip Vendil.

        public Message(javax.json.JsonReader jsonReader,
               com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessageV3.Builder builder)
        throws javax.json.JsonException
        Base constructor used when reading from JSON.
        Parameters:
        jsonReader - the json object to parse and set all related fields.
        builder - the API Object builder set by inheriting message object.
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException - if problems occurred parsing the JSON data.
